verbose_text: XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR Given that the increase in RNA precursors (RNA19) we report was similar to those seen in subjects with deleterious HSD17B10 (MRPP2) variants (MIM : 300438), XREF_BIBR it is possible that decreased MRPP1 protein levels are particularly important for RNA processing because MRPP2 levels were not shown to be diminished in either of the cases documented here (XREF_FIG B).
